wikipedia.title: Wreckx-n-Effect
wikipedia.extract: Wreckx-n-Effect is an American new jack swing group from Harlem, New York City who are known for their multi-platinum hit "Rump Shaker" in 1992, which was produced by Teddy Riley.

opinions.details: 这个要加注释。原名wrecks - n effect，因乐团成员brandon mitchell在1990年被枪杀，改名成Wreckx-n-Effect，x字母象征brandon的离世。中文直翻成遇难效应有点拗口，意译的话我暂时想到：致死效应。
